item.title: The Temptations - My Girl - Keys of C, D - DrJillReese
item.description: Play along video for the song My Girl by The Temptations from the channel DrJillReese. Chords used in the song: A, A7, C, D, Dm, Em, F, G, G7.

item.title: Sam Cooke - You Send Me - Key of G - Dr. A
item.description: Play along video for the song You Send Me by Sam Cooke from the channel Dr. A. Chords used in the song: A7, Am7, C, D, D7, E7, Em7, F7, G.

item.title: Amy Winehouse - Back To Black - Key of Dm - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Back To Black by Amy Winehouse from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A, B♭, Dm, Gm.

item.title: Amy Winehouse - Rehab - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Rehab by Amy Winehouse from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, A♭, C, Em, F, G7.

item.title: Sam Cooke - A Change Is Gonna Come - Key of Bb - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song A Change Is Gonna Come by Sam Cooke from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: B♭, C7, Cm7, D7, E♭, F7, Gm7.

item.title: Bill Withers - Ain't No Sunshine - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Ain't No Sunshine by Bill Withers from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: B♭, Cm, Fm, Gm7.

item.title: Sam Cooke - Cupid - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Cupid by Sam Cooke from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D7, Em, G.

item.title: Ike & Tina Turner - Proud Mary - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Proud Mary by Ike & Tina Turner from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am, C, G.

item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song When a Man Loves a Woman by Percy Sledge from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, Em, F, G7.

item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay - Key of G - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay by Otis Redding from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A, B, C, D, E7, F, G.

item.title: Jackie Wilson - Higher And Higher - Key of D - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Higher And Higher by Jackie Wilson from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: D, G, G6.

item.title: Gnarls Barkley - Crazy - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Crazy by Gnarls Barkley from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, Cmaj7, E7, F.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Isn't She Lovely - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Isn't She Lovely by Stevie Wonder from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, A♯maj7, C7, Dm7, F, G7.
